alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Luzerne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 2:33PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lackawanna and northeastern Luzerne Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 233 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wilkes-Barre, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Scranton, Wilkes-Barre, Dunmore, Kingston, Nanticoke, Plains, Old Forge, Pittston, Blakely and Taylor. This includes the following highway exits... Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 159 and 197. Interstate 84 between 1 and 2, and near 4. Interstate 380 between 20 and 24. Interstate 476 between 105 and 131. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for northeastern Pennsylvania.
